Contact

Reporting bugs

To report bugs please send a simple e-mail to the package maintainer: <Achim.Zeileis at R-project.org>

For discussions we also try to follow these channels:

  • StackOverflow with colors and r tags
  • Twitter (see the developers’ handles below)
  • R-help mailing list

Other resources

  • http://hclwizard.org/
    Blog and online shiny apps.
  • https://github.com/retostauffer/python-colorspace
    Python re-implementation of the R package.
